title: Chicken noodle miso soup
description: Everybody loves a warming bowl of chicken soup. This soup flavoured with miso is perfect for a light healthy lunch. This meal is low calorie and provides 331 kcal, 26g protein, 42g carbohydrate (of which 3.3g sugars), 6.7g fat (of which 1.5g saturates), 4g fibre and 1.4g salt per portion.
